COMMENT_TX: $Managers: Red Schoendienst (NL St. Louis), Dick Williams (AL Boston); First 1-0 game in All-Star history; Records: Drysdale's fifth start and eighth game, 19 1/3 IP; Mays, 20 runs, 66 ABs, 23 hits; Players, managers, and coaches chose position starters;  reserves were chosen by Schoendienst & Williams; MVP: Willie Mays (San Francisco NL)
